full_summary:
### Gas Chromatograph RFP
#### Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C041

* **Tender Identifier:** cb-8973-13774785
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-12
* **Tender Close Date:** 2023-10-23T16:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Regina, Saskatchewan S4P 0M3

#### Rationale
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Swift Current Research and Development Center is seeking a Gas Chromatograph to support its research and development activities. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to suppliers holding a Pre-qualified Supply Arrangement (PSA) for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.

#### Requirements
• Supply and delivery of one Gas Chromatograph
• Mandatory technical criteria: Manufacturer, model, year of manufacture, warranty, and maintenance requirements

#### Evaluation Criteria
The responsive bidder holding a Pre-qualified Supply Arrangement (PSA) who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Notice Details
* **Access Information:** Solicitation documents are available on the CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) platform. Interested suppliers must register and download the solicitation documents to participate in the RFP process.
* **Language of Bid:** English and/or French
* **Note:** This RFP is closed to non-registered suppliers.

**Contact Information**
Zack Flamont
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
(639) 560-3462
zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca

#### Important Dates
• Publication Date: 2023-09-12
• Tender Close Date: 2023-10-23T16:00:00 (Closed)
• Contract Start Date: 2023-09-27 (Pending)
• Contract End Date: 2024-03-31 (Pending)

#### Additional Information
The RFP is open to suppliers who have registered with Public Works and Government Services Canada for PSA E60PV-19-EQUI. Suppliers who have questions or require clarification on the RFP should contact Zack Flamont, the procurement authority for this RFP.

Note: I have trimmed the redundant parts of the original text to create a clear, concise, and well-formatted R
